page.title: 04A Local Engineering Factory.
page.content: Porters Tools are automation and robotic engineers.Their site is down Church Lane at Newton Works in Waltham.They have been in Waltham for more than thirty years.They chose a rural site because of the pleasant surroundings for the employees.There are thirty-five employees and they are mostly local people.Porters Tools train their own staff. Their work is high precision engineering.They make parts for machines.A lot of their work is for car industries.They probably sell to every car making company.Their export trade is world-wide. During the war they were involved in the making of Rolls Royce Merlin engines.They have produced parts for gas turbine pumping units, helicopters, aircraft and rockets.
